data.title: Not the Best of this Chain
data.text:
We have frequented this establishment a few times. Most experiences are okay, but none have been as pleasant as the Plainfield or other locations. Today we witnessed another customer leave because he couldn't get service. I also think it's bad policy to have employees, lounging in the eating area even if they're on break. By lounging, I mean draping themselves across the furniture. 
The restaurant is clean. The food is fine. Unfortunately, they just don't show up for service and friendliness

data.title: Generous business and the Best Donut Holes Ever
data.text: This is a very generous business and they have an amazing product. Donuts. MMMMM, who doesn't love donuts? My favorites are the donut holes. They are so good.
